content:
Have you tried Firecracker Shrimp?
==================================

[Order Now](https://order.toasttab.com/online/himalayan-restaurant-niles)

Family Meal Deals
=================

Try our Family Specials & Combo Meals

[Order Now](https://www.himalayanrestaurant.com/family-speical-meal-deal)

Previous Next

[](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant)

**Chicago South Loop**
----------------------

606 S Wabash Avenue, Chicago, IL 60605  
**Tel: 312.877.5999**

PICKUP & DELIVERY

**Mon – Thu**

11:00 am – 3:00 pm; 4:00 pm – 9:00 pm

**Fri – Sun**

12:00 pm – 3:00 pm; 4:00 pm – 9:30 pm

###### Order Here : [Chicago](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant)

[](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles)

**Niles**
---------

8265 W Golf Road, Niles IL 60714  
**Tel: 847.324.4150**

PICKUP & DELIVERY

**Mon – Fri** 

11:15 am-2:15 pm; 4:30 pm-9:30 pm

**Sat**

12:00 pm-3:00 pm; 4:30 pm – 9:30 pm

**Sun**

12:00 pm-3:00 pm; 4:30 pm – 9:00 pm

###### Order Here : [Niles](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles)

Popular Items
=============

[Most popular items of the restaurant](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/popular-items)

slide 1 to 4 of 6

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65700b1ec0171.jpg)

Chicken Biryani
===============

Basmati rice flavored and cooked with Chicken in chef’s special biryani Masala.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793e73da434.jpg)

Chicken Tikka Masala
====================

Expert Marinated chicken breast cooked in creamy onion tomato sauce.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793eb167c20.jpg)

Sheesh Kebab
============

Minced lamb blended in chef's combination of herbs and spices, roasted in clay oven

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793f6e6b56d.jpg)

Chicken Momo
============

The momo embodies many cultures into a single entity.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793fb21b911.jpg)

Tandoori Prawn
==============

Jumbo prawn roasted in clay oven and cooked in special seasoned sauce.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793ff970012.jpg)

Samosa Chat
===========

Crispy samosas topped with Tangy and Spicy yogurt and chutney.

Special Offers
==============

Himalayan Restaurant special offers

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/posts/attachments/655daaa8d2eff.jpg)

Family Special Meal Deal
========================

We have created a FAMILY MEAL FOR 4 deal of your favorite Indian and Nepalese food. It will be available for pickup and delivery and take away home family meal comprises selction of one appetizer, 3 traditional entrees, 1 basmati rice and 3 butter naan.

[More Details](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/family-speical-meal-deal)

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/posts/attachments/656860f1597fc.jpg)

Himalayan express lunch specials
================================

Introducing new Himalayan Express Lunch menu at our Niles location after amazing response at our south loop Chicago location. Choices of Himalayan lunch express meal available are: Big Plate

[More Details](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/himalayan-express-lunch-specials)

News & Blog
===========

Menu, deals, coupons, recipes

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/posts/attachments/6592812a1e2a8.jpg)

[Valentine’s Day Special 2021](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/valentines-day-special-2021)

Jan 01 , 2024

Easy to order: Call us at 847-324-4150 Niles | (Advance) Order online: Order Now    [...more](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/valentines-day-special-2021)

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/posts/attachments/657c2c009f274.jpg)

[10 must have vegan dishes](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/10-must-have-vegan-dishes-at-himalayan-restaurant-niles-chicago)

Dec 15 , 2023

Is Himalayan Restaurant (Chicago South Loop & Niles) a good place for    [...more](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/10-must-have-vegan-dishes-at-himalayan-restaurant-niles-chicago)

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/posts/attachments/657c2a34549b7.jpg)

[Fathers Day Special Meal Deal](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/fathers-day-special-meal-deal)

Dec 15 , 2023

Happy Father's Day 2020!!! This year with awful pandemic still around, we are    [...more](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/fathers-day-special-meal-deal)
